snippet: One of the most famous detectives in literature returns, as Sophie Hannah takes up the mantle of one of the best-selling novelists of all time with her new mystery, “The Monogram Murders.” Solve the clues to find out who they are!
lead_paragraph: One of the most famous detectives in literature returns, as Sophie Hannah takes up the mantle of one of the best-selling novelists of all time with her new mystery, “The Monogram Murders.” Solve the clues to find out who they are!
